nodes.text: Tureen VI was an astronomical object located in the Tureen system in the Outer Rim Territories's Kriz sector. It was the origin of the Soup People, a group known for making high-quality soup. The Besalisk chef Dexter Jettster wrote in the menu for his restaurant, Dex's Diner on the planet Coruscant, that his soups were good enough to make their eaters think they were made by the Soup People of Tureen VI.

Tureen VI was introduced in "Dining at Dex's," a 2009 Hyperspace-exclusive article which was written by Gregory Walker and formatted as an in-universe menu. Walker called it a silly throwaway reference as a tureen is a dish used to hold soup. The StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Tureen system, and therefore Tureen VI, in grid square J-18.
